name: .PHP2 File Extension
summary: Learn about .PHP2 files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: A PHP2 file is a web file that may contain PHP 2 source code. The PHP code within the page is parsed by a PHP engine on the web server that dynamically generates HTML sent to the user's web browser. The file may be used in combination with the MySQL database.

content: PHP2 pages can be processed by Apache, Windows Server, or Mac OS X Server with the PHP engine installed. They can be edited with a text editor or web development program.
NOTE: The PHP2 file is uncommon since PHP pages generally use the .PHP file extension.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
